column1: Baby Barnaby's////FOOD: Ordered the corn beef hash and migas. The hash was good
column2: but not as good as the migas. Try the migas! House potatoes came with both plates. They were crunchy and delicious. Coffee was good
column3: nice breakfast blend and not watery. Next time I will order a juice
column4: I didn't realize they were freshly squeezed.
